headline: Is Lockheed Martin A Long Term Opportunity After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether Lockheed Martin is quietly turning into a value opportunity or just a classic defense giant at a fair price, you are in the right place. Despite a solid 43.4% gain over the last 5 years, the stock has drifted lower recently, down 1.2% over the past week, 4.4% over the last month, and 6.2% year to date, leaving it about 9.3% lower than it was a year ago. Those softer returns come as investors digest shifting defense budgets, evolving geopolitical risks, and a...
